verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> [Tle-da-Vid, of David מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> Shir. [or] Song יָק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> ya-Kum arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him Let God יָפ֣וּצוּ <S%H6327><s%> ya-Fu-tzu be scattered אוֹיְבָ֑יו <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vav; let his enemies וְיָנ֥וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> ve-ya-Nu-su him flee מְ֝שַׂנְאָ֗יו <S%H8130><s%> me-san-'Av, let them also that hate מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nav. before

כְּהִנְדֹּ֥ף <S%H5086><s%> ke-hin-Dof is driven away עָשָׁ֗ן <S%H6227><s%> 'a-Shan, As smoke תִּ֫נְדֹּ֥ף <S%H5086><s%> tin-Dof [so] drive [them] away כְּהִמֵּ֣ס <S%H4549><s%> ke-him-Mes melteth דּ֭וֹנַג <S%H1749><s%> Do-nag as wax מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-nei- before אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh; the fire יֹאבְד֥וּ <S%H6><s%> yoe-Du perish רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> re-sha-'Im, [so] let the wicked מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei at the presence אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. of God

וְֽצַדִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> ve-tzad-di-Kim, But let the righteous יִשְׂמְח֣וּ <S%H8055><s%> yis-me-Chu be glad יַֽ֭עַלְצוּ <S%H5970><s%> Ya-'al-tzu let them rejoice לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God וְיָשִׂ֥ישׂוּ <S%H7797><s%> ve-ya-Si-su rejoice בְשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <S%H8057><s%> ve-sim-Chah. yea let them exceedingly

שִׁ֤ירוּ׀ <S%H7891><s%> Shi-ru Sing לֵֽאלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him unto God זַמְּר֪וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru sing praises שְׁ֫מ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo to his name סֹ֡לּוּ <S%H5549><s%> Sol-lu extol לָרֹכֵ֣ב <S%H7392><s%> la-ro-Chev him that rideth בָּ֭עֲרָבוֹת <S%H6160><s%> Ba-'a-ra-Vot upon the heavens בְּיָ֥הּ <S%H3050><s%> be-Yah JAH שְׁמ֗וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo, by his name וְעִלְז֥וּ <S%H5937><s%> ve-'il-Zu and rejoice לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav. before

אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi A father יְ֭תוֹמִים <S%H3490><s%> Ye-to-mim of the fatherless וְדַיַּ֣ן <S%H1781><s%> ve-dai-Yan and a judge אַלְמָנ֑וֹת <S%H490><s%> al-ma-Not; of the widows אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, [is] God בִּמְע֥וֹן <S%H4583><s%> bim-'on habitation קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho. in his holy

אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God מ֘וֹשִׁ֤יב <S%H3427><s%> mo-Shiv setteth יְחִידִ֨ים׀ <S%H3173><s%> ye-chi-Dim the solitary בַּ֗יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> Bay-tah, in families מוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> mo-Tzi he bringeth out אֲ֭סִירִים <S%H615><s%> 'A-si-rim those which are bound בַּכּוֹשָׁר֑וֹת <S%H3574><s%> bak-ko-sha-Rot; with chains אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Only ס֝וֹרֲרִ֗ים <S%H5637><s%> so-ra-Rim, but the rebellious שָׁכְנ֥וּ <S%H7931><s%> sha-che-Nu dwell צְחִיחָֽה׃ <S%H6707><s%> tze-chi-Chah. in a dry

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, O God בְּ֭צֵאתְךָ <S%H3318><s%> Be-tze-te-cha when thou wentest forth לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Me-cha; thy people בְּצַעְדְּךָ֖ <S%H6805><s%> be-tza'-de-Cha when thou didst march בִֽישִׁימ֣וֹן <S%H3452><s%> vi-shi-Mon through the wilderness סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz The earth רָעָ֨שָׁה׀ <S%H7493><s%> ra-'A-shah shook אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- also שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim the heavens נָטְפוּ֮ <S%H5197><s%> na-te-Fu also dropped מִפְּנֵ֪י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei at the presence אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh itself סִינַ֑י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai; [even] Sinai מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei [was moved] at the presence אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

גֶּ֣שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> Ge-shem rain נְ֭דָבוֹת <S%H5071><s%> Ne-da-Vot a plentiful תָּנִ֣יף <S%H5130><s%> ta-Nif didst send אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; Thou O God נַחֲלָתְךָ֥ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-te-Cha thine inheritance וְ֝נִלְאָ֗ה <S%H3811><s%> ve-nil-'Ah, when it was weary אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You כֽוֹנַנְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3559><s%> Cho-nan-Tah. whereby thou didst confirm

חַיָּתְךָ֥ <S%H2416><s%> chai-ya-te-Cha Thy congregation יָֽשְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-vu- hath dwelt בָ֑הּ Vah; תָּ֤כִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> ta-Chin hast prepared בְּטוֹבָתְךָ֖ <S%H2896><s%> be-toa-te-Cha of thy goodness לֶעָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> le-'a-Ni for the poor אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. therein thou O God

אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai The Lord יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> yit-ten- gave אֹ֑מֶר <S%H562><s%> 'O-mer; the word הַֽ֝מְבַשְּׂר֗וֹת <S%H1319><s%> ham-vas-se-Rot, of those that published צָבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va [was] the company רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> Rav. great

מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei Kings צְ֭בָאוֹת <S%H6635><s%> Tze-va-'ot of armies יִדֹּד֣וּן <S%H5074><s%> yid-do-Dun did flee יִדֹּד֑וּן <S%H5074><s%> yid-do-Dun; apace וּנְוַת <S%H5116><s%> u-ne-vat and she that tarried בַּ֝֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> Ba-yit, at home תְּחַלֵּ֥ק <S%H2505><s%> te-chal-Lek divided שָׁלָֽל׃ <S%H7998><s%> sha-Lal. the spoil

אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- When תִּשְׁכְּבוּן֮ <S%H7901><s%> tish-ke-Vun Though ye have lien בֵּ֪ין <S%H996><s%> bein among שְׁפַ֫תָּ֥יִם <S%H8240><s%> she-Fat-Ta-yim among the pots כַּנְפֵ֣י <S%H3671><s%> kan-Fei [yet shall ye be as] the wings י֭וֹנָה <S%H3123><s%> Yo-nah of a dove נֶחְפָּ֣ה <S%H2645><s%> nech-Pah covered בַכֶּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> vak-Ke-sef; with silver וְ֝אֶבְרוֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H3422><s%> ve-'ev-ro-Tei-ha, with yellow בִּֽירַקְרַ֥ק <S%H84><s%> bi-rak-Rak and her feathers חָרֽוּץ׃ <S%H2742><s%> cha-Rutz. gold

בְּפָ֘רֵ֤שׂ <S%H6566><s%> be-Fa-Res scattered שַׁדַּ֓י <S%H7706><s%> shad-Dai When the Almighty מְלָ֘כִ֤ים <S%H4428><s%> me-La-Chim kings בָּ֗הּ Bah, תַּשְׁלֵ֥ג <S%H7949><s%> tash-Leg in it it was [white] as snow בְּצַלְמֽוֹן׃ <S%H6756><s%> be-tzal-Mon. in Salmon

הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- The hill אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- [is as] the hill בָּשָׁ֑ן <S%H1316><s%> ba-Shan; of Bashan הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> har hill גַּ֝בְנֻנִּ֗ים <S%H1386><s%> gav-nun-Nim, an high הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- [as] the hill בָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> ba-Shan. of Bashan

לָ֤מָּה׀ <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תְּֽרַצְּדוּן֮ <S%H7520><s%> te-ratz-tze-Dun Why leap הָרִ֪ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim mountains גַּבְנֻ֫נִּ֥ים <S%H1386><s%> gav-Nun-Nim ye ye high הָהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har, the mountain חָמַ֣ד <S%H2530><s%> cha-Mad desireth אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him [which] God לְשִׁבְתּ֑וֹ <S%H3427><s%> le-shiv-To; to dwell in אַף־ <S%H637><s%> 'af- yet יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh yea the LORD יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> yish-Kon will dwell לָנֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> la-Ne-tzach. [in it] for ever

רֶ֤כֶב <S%H7393><s%> Re-chev The chariots אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God רִבֹּתַ֣יִם <S%H7239><s%> rib-bo-Ta-yim [are] twenty thousand אַלְפֵ֣י <S%H505><s%> 'al-Fei [even] thousands שִׁנְאָ֑ן <S%H8136><s%> shin-'An; of angels אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord בָ֝֗ם Vam, סִינַ֥י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai [is] among them [as in] Sinai בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> bak-Ko-desh. in the holy

עָ֘לִ֤יתָ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Li-ta Thou hast ascended לַמָּר֨וֹם׀ <S%H4791><s%> lam-ma-Rom on high שָׁ֘בִ֤יתָ <S%H7617><s%> sha-Vi-ta captive שֶּׁ֗בִי <S%H7628><s%> She-vi, thou hast led captivity לָקַ֣חְתָּ <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach-ta thou hast received מַ֭תָּנוֹת <S%H4979><s%> Mat-ta-not gifts בָּאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> ba-'a-Dam; for men וְאַ֥ף <S%H637><s%> ve-'Af also ס֝וֹרְרִ֗ים <S%H5637><s%> sor-Rim, yea [for] the rebellious לִשְׁכֹּ֤ן׀ <S%H7931><s%> lish-Kon might dwell יָ֬הּ <S%H3050><s%> yah also that the LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. God

בָּ֤ר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed אֲדֹנָי֮ <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai [be] the Lord י֤וֹם׀ <S%H3117><s%> Yom daily י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom daily יַֽעֲמָס־ <S%H6006><s%> ya-'a-mos- loadeth לָ֗נוּ La-nu, הָ֘אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> ha-'El us [with benefits even] the God יְֽשׁוּעָתֵ֬נוּ <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Te-nu of our salvation סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

הָ֤אֵ֣ל׀ <S%H410><s%> ha-'El [He that is] our God לָנוּ֮ la-Nu אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> 'el [is] the God לְֽמוֹשָׁ֫ע֥וֹת <S%H4190><s%> le-mo-Sha-'ot of salvation וְלֵיהוִ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh and unto GOD אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai; the Lord לַ֝מָּ֗וֶת <S%H4194><s%> lam-Ma-vet, from death תּוֹצָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H8444><s%> to-tza-'ot. [belong] the issues

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- Surely אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, But God יִמְחַץ֮ <S%H4272><s%> yim-Chatz shall wound רֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh the head אֹ֫יְבָ֥יו <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vav of his enemies קָדְקֹ֥ד <S%H6936><s%> ka-de-Kod scalp שֵׂעָ֑ר <S%H8181><s%> se-'Ar; [and] the hairy מִ֝תְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> mit-hal-Lech, of such an one as goeth on still בַּאֲשָׁמָֽיו׃ <S%H817><s%> ba-'a-sha-Mav. in his trespasses

אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> 'A-do-nai The Lord מִבָּשָׁ֣ן <S%H1316><s%> mib-ba-Shan from Bashan אָשִׁ֑יב <S%H7725><s%> 'a-Shiv; I will bring again אָ֝שִׁ֗יב <S%H7725><s%> 'a-Shiv, I will bring [my people] again מִֽמְּצֻל֥וֹת <S%H4688><s%> mi-me-tzu-Lot from the depths יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> Yam. of the sea

לְמַ֤עַן׀ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of תִּֽמְחַ֥ץ <S%H4272><s%> tim-Chatz may be dipped רַגְלְךָ֗ <S%H7272><s%> rag-le-Cha, That thy foot בְּ֫דָ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> be-Dam in the blood לְשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> le-Shon [and] the tongue כְּלָבֶ֑יךָ <S%H3611><s%> ke-la-Vei-cha; of thy dogs מֵאֹיְבִ֥ים <S%H341><s%> me-'o-ye-Vim of [thine] enemies מִנֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> min-Ne-hu. They

רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U They have seen הֲלִיכוֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H1979><s%> ha-li-cho-Tei-cha thy goings אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; O God הֲלִ֘יכ֤וֹת <S%H1979><s%> ha-Li-Chot [even] the goings אֵלִ֖י <S%H410><s%> 'e-Li of my God מַלְכִּ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Ki my King בַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> vak-Ko-desh. in the sanctuary

קִדְּמ֣וּ <S%H6923><s%> kid-de-Mu went before שָׁ֭רִים <S%H7891><s%> rim The singers אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char [followed] after נֹגְנִ֑ים <S%H5059><s%> no-ge-Nim; the players on instruments בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among עֲ֝לָמ֗וֹת <S%H5959><s%> a-la-Mot, [them were] the damsels תּוֹפֵפֽוֹת׃ <S%H8608><s%> to-fe-Fot. playing with timbrels

בְּֽ֭מַקְהֵלוֹת <S%H4721><s%> Be-mak-he-lot in the congregations בָּרְכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> ba-re-Chu Bless אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; ye God יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מִמְּק֥וֹר <S%H4726><s%> mi-me-Kor from the fountain יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> sham There בִּנְיָמִ֨ן׀ <S%H1144><s%> bin-ya-Min Benjamin צָעִ֡יר <S%H6810><s%> tza-'Ir There [is] little רֹדֵ֗ם <S%H7287><s%> ro-Dem, [with] their ruler שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei the princes יְ֭הוּדָה <S%H3063><s%> Ye-hu-dah of Judah רִגְמָתָ֑ם <S%H7277><s%> rig-ma-Tam; [and] their council שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei the princes זְ֝בֻל֗וּן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun, of Zebulun שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei [and] the princes נַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <S%H5321><s%> naf-ta-Li. of Naphtali

צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah hath commanded אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, Thy God עֻ֫זֶּ֥ךָ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Ze-cha thy strength עוּזָּ֥ה <S%H5810><s%> 'uz-Zah strengthen אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; O God ז֝֗וּ <S%H2098><s%> Zu, that which פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <S%H6466><s%> pa-'Al-ta thou hast wrought לָּֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

מֵֽ֭הֵיכָלֶךָ <S%H1964><s%> Me-hei-chal-cha Because of thy temple עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; at Jerusalem לְךָ֤ le-Cha יוֹבִ֖ילוּ <S%H2986><s%> yo-Vi-lu bring מְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim shall kings שָֽׁי׃ <S%H7862><s%> Shai. presents
